word: Jacob wrestled with the angel all night before he gained the victory. When morning broke the angel said, Let me go, for the day breaketh. But Jacob answered, "I will not let thee go, except thou bless me" [Genesis 32:26]. Then his prayer was answered. "Thy name shall be no more Jacob," said the angel, "but Israel; for as a Prince hast thou power with God, and hast prevailed" [verse 28].
